A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It’s really baffling to see that Rian Johnson and Disney\, when taking on the responsibility of continuing such an influential story\, just don’t understand the heart and themes and characters of Star Wars. More than anything The Last Jedi is one of those reflections of our current culture and Hollywood in general. It’s fun\, it’s enjoyable\, and it’s devoid of substance or value.
